title: ProactiveMobile: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Boosting Proactive Intelligence on Mobile Devices
what_happened: arXiv:2602.21858v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Multimodal large language models (MLLMs) have made significant progress in mobile agent development, yet their capabilities are predominantly confined to a reactive paradigm, where they merely execute explicit user commands. title: Anthropic acquires Vercept to give Claude sharper eyes for reading and controlling computer screens
what_happened: Anthropic acquires Vercept to boost Claude's computer use with the startup's screen recognition model "VyUI." The article Anthropic acquires Vercept to give Claude sharper eyes for reading and controlling computer screens appeared first on The Decoder.

title: Anthropic can't stop humanizing its AI models, now Claude Opus 3 gets a retirement blog
what_happened: Anthropic is retiring its Claude Opus 3 AI model and letting it publish weekly essays on Substack. The company says it conducted "retirement interviews" to ask the model about its wishes, and it "enthusiastically" agreed. title: Hands-On With Nano Banana 2, the Latest Version of Google’s AI Image Generator
what_happened: Google’s latest image model, Nano Banana 2, is a powerful AI photo editor that punctures reality. Well, sometimes.

title: How Chinese AI Chatbots Censor Themselves
what_happened: Researchers from Stanford and Princeton found that Chinese AI models are more likely than their Western counterparts to dodge political questions or deliver inaccurate answers.
